short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With voice controller you can access links with ease. Just open the extension add a command and speak it!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired on wandering around the web? Then this is the extension for you! Just open the extension add a command and speak
